articles.description: Frank Lampard admits Everton are not in a position to replace Dominic Calvert-Lewin with “another £50million striker"
articles.content: Frank Lampard has hailed the return to fitness of Dominic Calvert-Lewin by admitting that Everton are not in a position to replace him with another £50million striker. The 25-year-old started for the… [+2618 chars]

articles.author: Colin Millar
articles.title: Karim Benzema snubs Cristiano Ronaldo claim in Ballon d'Or admission - The Mirror
articles.description: Karim Benzema was asked where he ranked in the list of all-time Real Madrid greats after being named as the Ballon d'Or winner for this calendar year for the first time
articles.content:
Karim Benzema has rejected claims comparing him to former Real Madrid teammate Cristiano Ronaldo after the striker claimed his maiden Ballon d'Or crown this week. 
 The two were part of a fearsome a… [+2748 chars]

articles.title: T20 World Cup: Ireland beat West Indies to advance in Hobart - BBC
articles.description: Brilliant Ireland advance in the Twenty20 World Cup by dumping out two-time champions West Indies with a nine-wicket victory in Hobart.
articles.content:
ICC Men's T20 World Cup Group B, Hobart
West Indies 146-5 (20 overs): King 62* (48), Delany 3-16
